title: ¡Vamos! Barcelona to Host 2026 Tour de France Grand Départ
content:
ASO confirms stages 1 and 2 of 2026 Tour de France will play out entirely in Catalunya before peloton heads back over the border during stage 3.

Read the full article at ¡Vamos! Barcelona to Host 2026 Tour de France Grand Départ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
